summary: Added a new LOOK lens: Hearing Preview (audibility heatmap).
Hearing Preview marks explored tiles where your footsteps would be audible to currently visible hostile listeners (visibility-gated; no unseen-enemy leaks).
Default keybind: Ctrl+H (bind_hearing_preview); [ / ] adjusts a volume bias to simulate louder/quieter actions.
Help overlay now lists LOOK lenses (sound / hearing / threat).
Docs: added docs/HEARING_PREVIEW.md and updated settings docs to include the new action.
